index_c_intro: 上证汇率对冲指数模拟投资者以美元投资标的指数，并通过美元兑离岸人民币一个月远期的多头合约对冲汇率风险的投资策略，其中远期合约每月底进行展期。
index_e_intro: SSE FX Hedged Indices hedge the currency exposure of the underlying index by taking long position in one-month exchange of foreign currency to domestic currency (CNH) forward, in order to eliminate FX volatility exposure of the underlying index.

index_e_intro: Dividend point index measures the cumulative value of all cash dividends announced and paid by the individual constituent of the respective underlying index，which can help investors analyze dividend changes. The dividend is reflected in the index on the ex-dividend dates in terms of index points.

index_c_intro: 上证 180、380 动量指数基于过去一年的风险调整价格动量，分别选取母指数中动量评分最高的 60 只和 120 只股票作为样本股，为投资者提供上证 180、380指数样本股中最具动量特征的股票的组合收益。
index_e_intro: SSE180 Momentum Index and SSE380 Momentum Index use risk adjusted price momentum over the previous 12 months as momentum indicator, and select the stocks that rank top 60 and 120 as constituents. SSE180 momentum index and SSE380 Momentum Index will provide the smart beta return for the investors.

index_c_intro: 上证180指数由沪市A股中规模大、流动性好的180只股票组成，反映上海证券市场一批蓝筹公司的股票价格表现。
index_e_intro: SSE 180 Index consists of the 180 largest and most liquid A-share stocks listed on Shanghai Stock Exchange. The Index aims to reflect the performance of the Shanghai blue chips.

index_c_intro: 上证健康产业指数以沪市全部A股为样本空间，选取医疗保健、食品安全、环保等三大产业中市值最大的50只股票作为样本股，并以等权重加权。
index_e_intro: SSE Health Industry Index consists of the largest 50 stocks from medical industry, food safety industry and environmental protection industry. The Index is equally weighted.

index_c_intro: 上证养老产业指数以沪市全部A股为样本空间，选取消闲用品、酒店旅游、教育文化、药品零售、乳品、家用品、医药卫生、人寿保险等相关行业中市值最大的40只股票作为样本股，并以等权重加权。
index_e_intro: SSE Old-Age Industry Index consists of the largest 40 stocks from industries such as consumer electronics, leisure products, hotels & travel, education, drug retail, dairy products, household products, health care and life insurance. The Index is equally weighted.

index_c_intro: 上证红利价值指数选择沪市股息率高且价值特征突出的50只股票组成指数样本，采用股息率加权计算。
index_e_intro: SSE Dividend Value Index aims to reflect the performance of high and steady-cash dividend-paying companies with strong value character. The index is weighted by dividend yield.

index_c_intro: 上证股债风险平价指数是通过优化权重配置，实现股票和债券大类资产对组合的风险贡献相同的策略。
index_e_intro: SSE Equity and Bond Risk Parity Index realizes equal risk contribution of equity and bond assets by allocating optimized weights to each asset class.
index_c_fullname: 上证股债风险平价指数
index_e_fullname: SSE Equity and Bond Risk Parity Index

index_c_intro: 上证红利低波动指数选择沪市股息率高且波动率低的50只股票组成指数样本，采用股息率加权计算。
index_e_intro: SSE Dividend Low Volatility Index aims to reflect the performance of high and steady-cash dividend-paying companies stocks with low volatility. The Index is weighted by dividend yield.

index_c_intro: 上证科技信息传媒（TMT）产业指数是由TMT相关产业中规模和流动性较好的50只公司股票组成，反映上海市场上市公司中TMT相关产业公司股票的走势。
index_e_intro: SSE TMT Industry Index consists of the largest 50 TMT stocks and is designated to reflect the performance of TMT industries stocks as a whole.
index_c_fullname: 上证科技信息传媒产业指数

index_c_intro: 上证智慧城镇指数选取沪市与智慧基础设施、智慧环境资源、智慧社会民生、智慧产业经济、智慧市政管理等主题相关且具有代表性的公司股票作为样本股，反映城镇化进程中受经济结构和消费结构变化影响的上市公司的表现。
index_e_intro: SSE Urbanization Smart Cities Index is among the SSE Urbanization Index Series. The Index consists of companies whose businesses are related to intelligent infrastructure, intelligent environmental resources, intelligent social life, intelligent industry, intelligent municipal management, reflecting the overall performance of the companies benefitting from urbanization.

index_c_intro: 上证城镇化指数选取沪市与智慧城镇、绿色城镇、城镇交通、城镇消费、城镇基建等主题相关且具有代表性的公司股票作为样本股，反映城镇化进程中受经济结构和消费结构变化影响的上市公司的表现。
index_e_intro: SSE Urbanization Index is among the SSE Urbanization Index Series. The Index consists of representative constituents of the Smart Cities Index, Green Cities Index, Urbanization Transport Index, Urbanization Consumption Index, Urbanization infrastructure Index, reflecting the overall performance of the companies benefitting from urbanization.

index_c_intro: 上证军工指数反映沪市军工行业上市公司的整体表现，由十大军工集团控股的且主营业务与军工行业相关的上市公司以及其他主营业务为军工行业的上市公司作为指数样本。
index_e_intro: SSE National Defense Industry Index is to track the performance of stocks in national defense industry. Those who are controlled by the largest 10 military group corporations or whose revenues are mainly from the national defense industry are selected as constituents.

index_c_intro: 上证智能交通指数选取沪市与城市和城际智能交通管理系统，软件制造商、数据提供商、硬件制造商、运营服务商等主题相关且具有代表性的公司股票作为样本股，反映城镇化进程中受经济结构和消费结构变化影响的上市公司的表现。
index_e_intro: SSE Urbanization Intelligent Transport Index is among the SSE Urbanization Index Series. index_c_intro: 上证城镇基建指数选取沪市与房地产管理与开发、建筑材料、建筑产品、建筑与工程等主题相关且具有代表性的公司股票作为样本股，反映城镇化进程中受经济结构和消费结构变化影响的上市公司的表现。
index_e_intro: SSE Urbanization Infrastructure Index is among the SSE Urbanization Index Series. index_c_intro: 上证城镇消费指数选取沪市与主要消费、可选消费、医药卫生等主题相关且具有代表性的公司股票作为样本股，反映城镇化进程中受经济结构和消费结构变化影响的上市公司的表现。
index_e_intro: SSE Urbanization Consumption Index is among the SSE Urbanization Index Series. The Index consists of companies from consumer staples, consumer discretionary or health care sectors, reflecting the overall performance of the companies benefitting from urbanization.

index_c_intro: 上证城镇交通指数选取沪市与城市轨道交通、智能交通、新能源汽车等主题相关且具有代表性的公司股票作为样本股反映城镇化进程中受经济结构和消费结构变化影响的上市公司的表现。

index_c_intro: 上证绿色城镇指数选取沪市与城市园林、水处理、空气净化、土壤修复、固废处理、节能照明、新能源汽车等主题相关且具有代表性的公司股票作为样本股，反映城镇化进程中受经济结构和消费结构变化影响的上市公司的表现。

index_c_intro: 上证红利潜力指数旨在反映上市公司中分红预期大、分红能力强的上市公司群体的表现。指数通过一组收益指标对股票进行综合排名，选取排名居前的50只股票组成指数样本，采用调整市值和股息率复合加权计算。
index_e_intro: SSE Dividend Potential index aims to reflect the performance of listed companies with high possibility and strong ability to distribute cash-dividend. Top 50 ranked stocks ranked by an overall return score are selected as constituents. The Index is weighted by adjusted market cap and dividend yield.

index_c_intro: 上证红利回报指数选择沪市累计分红融资比和过去三年平均分红融资比高的股票作为指数样本，旨在反映分红回报高的股票的表现。
index_e_intro: SSE Dividend Return Index consists of top ranked stocks by accumulative total dividend to raised fund ratio and 3-year average total dividend to raised fund ratio, which aims to reflect the performance of high dividend return stocks in the Shanghai market.

index_c_intro: 文化产业指数根据国家统计局文化产业分类，将新闻出版发行服务，广播电视电影服务，文化艺术服务等行业最具代表性的股票作为样本股，以反映文化产业公司的表现。
index_e_intro: SSE Culture Industries Index consists of most representative stocks from news, publishing & distribution services, broadcasting, TV & film services, cultural and artistic services, etc. industries and reflects the overall performance of culture industry stocks.

index_c_intro: 上证战略性信息产业指数以沪市全部A股为样本空间，在信息技术、电信业务行业的基础上，纳入消费电子产品、互联网零售、新闻出版、广播影视等与传统信息产业发展融合较深的行业，选取其中最大的50只股票作为样本股，描绘战略性信息产业“三网融合”、“两化融合”等发展特点。
index_e_intro: SSE Strategic Information Industry Index consists of 50 most representative stocks from the strategic information industry, in terms of market-cap and liquidity. index_c_intro: 中证机器人指数是选取系统方案商、数字化车间与生产线系统集成商、自动化设备制造商、自动化零部件商以及其他相关公司作为样本股，以反映机器人产业相关股票的走势。

index_e_intro: CSI Securities and Insurance Index consists of representative stocks from industry in terms of market capitalization and trading value. The index is to reflect the performance of securities and insurance industry.

index_c_intro: 中证淘金大数据100指数以电商商品类目相关中证三级行业的所有股票为样本空间，从中根据综合财务因子、市场驱动因子、电商大数据因子选取综合评分最高的100名作为样本股，并采用等权重计算。
index_e_intro: CSI Taojin Big Data 100 Indexs universe is all the stocks from CICS Industries related to online product catalogues. The Index consists of top 100 stocks with the highest overall exposure level to synthetic financial factor, synthetic market factor and JuYuan E-Commerce big data factor. The Index is equally weighted.

index_e_intro: CSI Currency Dynamic Hedged Indices hedge the currency exposure of the underlying index by taking long position in one-month USD-CNH forward. index_c_intro: 中证红利波动率控制10%指数由股票（中证红利指数）、现金（中证短融50指数）共两类资产以一定的比例构成，目标波动率为10%，以获取较好的风险调整后收益。
index_e_intro: CSI Dividend Volatility Control 10% Index comprises of equity (CSI Dividend Index) and cash (CSI Short Term Note 50 Index). The weight of equity assets is rebalanced as a function of the realized volatility of the underlying index in order to limit the risk exposure of the overall portfolio and to obtain better risk-adjusted return.

中证-第一财经银行理财产品指数（三个月内）以发行期限在92天之内的产品为样本，覆盖当前最主要的产品期限，具有良好的代表性。本系列还包括1个月、2个月、3个月、6个月和12个月等5条细分期限指数，分别以样本空间中16-46天、47-77天、77-107天、168-198天、351-381天的产品为样本，能更为细致全面地表征市场。

index_c_intro: 中证500波动率控制15%指数由中证500指数及中证短融50指数以一定的比例构成，股票资产仓位根据中证500指数的波动率水平每月调整一次，以控制组合的目标波动率在15%。

index_e_intro:

index_c_intro: 中证500稳定指数是在中证500指数样本内，根据波动率因子和质量因子计算敏感性评分，选取对宏观环境和经济周期变动具有较低风险敞口的股票构成样本股，旨在反映这一类股票的整体表现。
index_e_intro: CSI 500 Stability Index consists of 250 constituents of CSI 500 Index that with the lower risk exposure to the microenvironment and economic cycles changes.

indx_sname: 一财理财指数（三个月内）
index_c_intro:
中证-第一财经银行理财产品系列指数选取在售保本型和非保本浮动型人民币银行理财产品为样本，以综合反映银行理财产品市场现状，向市场提供参考指标。
中证-第一财经银行理财产品指数（三个月内）以发行期限在92天之内的产品为样本，覆盖当前最主要的产品期限，具有良好的代表性。本系列还包括1个月、2个月、3个月、6个月和12个月等5条细分期限指数，分别以样本空间中16-46天、47-77天、77-107天、168-198天、351-381天的产品为样本，能更为细致全面地表征市场。
index_e_intro:
To reflect the present situation of China’s bank wealth investment products market and to provide analysis tools for investors, CSI-CBN Banks’ Wealth Investment Products Indices consist of both capital-guaranteed products and flexible-return products. 
CSI-CBN Banks' Wealth Investment Products Index (within 3 months) is a comprehensive index covering products within a term of 92 days. The other indices in the series include sub-divided indices of products within one month, two months, three months, six months and 12 months.
index_c_fullname: 中证-第一财经银行理财产品指数（三个月内）

为反映中国基金市场中优秀基金群体的整体绩效表现，为市场及投资者提供更加丰富的基金业绩评价基准和基金投资参考依据，中证指数有限公司和中国证券报携手发布中证金牛混合型基金指数。

index_c_intro: 中证股票型基金指数样本由中证开放式基金指数样本中的股票型基金组成。
index_e_intro: CSI Stock Fund Index consists of all the open-end publicly offered stock funds.

index_c_intro: 中证开放式基金指数样本由当前市场上的所有开放式基金（不包括货币型和+保本型）组成。
index_e_intro: CSI Open-end Fund Index consists of all the open-end publicly offered funds (excluding money market funds and guaranteed funds).

index_c_intro: 中证企业债100指数是国内首只跨市场成份类信用债券指数，该指数从银行间市场和沪深交易所市场挑选100只剩余期限在1到10年之间且流动性强、规模大的信用债券组成样本。
index_e_intro: CSI Enterprise Bond 100 Index is composed of 100 credit bonds trading in exchange market and inter-bank market with high liquidity and large outstanding, whose term to maturity are between 1 and 10 years.

index_c_intro: 上证可质押城投债指数的样本由沪市剩余期限1年以上、债项评级为投资级以上、符合中国证券登记结算公司对可质押债券要求的城投类债券样本组成。
index_e_intro: SSE Pledgeable Urban Construction Investment Bond Index is composed of pledgeable credit bonds traded on Shanghai Stock Exchange with term to maturity above 1 year and credit rating above investment grade.
index_c_fullname: 上证可质押城投债指数
index_e_fullname: SSE Pledgeable Urban Construction Investment Bond Index

index_c_intro: 中证金边中期国债指数是国内首只成份类国债指数，该指数挑选剩余期限4-7年且在交易所和银行间市场同时上市交易的国债组成样本。
index_e_intro: CSI Gilt-Edged Medium Term Treasury Note Index is composed of treasury bonds traded in exchange market and inter-bank market with term to maturity between 4 and 7 years.
index_c_fullname: 中证金边中期国债指数
index_e_fullname: CSI Gilt-Edged Medium Term Treasury Note Index

index_c_intro: 中证50债券指数是国内首只跨市场成份类债券指数，该指数从包括上海证券交易所市场、深圳证券交易所市场以及银行间市场挑选50只流动性强、规模大、质地好的债券组成样本。
index_e_intro: CSI 50 Bond Index is the first cross market component bond index in China. The Index is composed of 50 bonds traded in exchanges and inter-bank market with good liquidity, large outstanding and high quality.

index_c_intro: 中证短债指数是综合反映一年期以下债券及票据整体价格变动趋势的指数，其样本包括一年期以下的国债、金融债、企业债、央票，以及短期融资券，该指数旨在反映短期债券的走势。
index_e_intro: CSI Short Term Bond Index consists of government bond, financial bond, corporate bond, central bank note, short term note in the inter-bank and exchanges market with remaining term to maturity between 1 month to 1 year.

index_c_intro: 中证短融指数由银行间市场的剩余期限1个月以上的短期融资券构成。
index_e_intro: CSI Short Term Note Index consists of short term notes in the inter-bank market with remaining term to maturity over 1 month.

index_c_intro: 中证1债指数由在沪深证券交易所及银行间市场上市的剩余期限1个月到1年的国债、金融债及企业债构成。
index_e_intro: CSI 1 Bond Index consists of government bond, financial bond and corporate bond in the inter-bank and exchanges market with remaining term to maturity less than 1 year.

index_c_intro: 中证综合债指数由在沪深证券交易所及银行间市场上市的剩余期限1个月以上的国债、金融债、企业债、央行票据及企业短期融资券构成。
index_e_intro: CSI Universal Bond Index consists of government bond, financial bond, corporate bond, central bank note, short term note in the inter-bank and exchanges market with remaining term to maturity over 1 month.

index_c_intro: 中证企业债指数由银行间市场和沪深交易所市场的剩余期限1年以上的企业债构成。
index_e_intro: CSI Corporate Bond Index consists of corporate bonds in the inter-bank and exchanges market with remaining term to maturity over 1 year.

index_c_intro: 中证金融债指数由银行间市场的剩余期限1年以上的金融债构成。
index_e_intro: CSI Financial Bond Index consists of financial bonds in the inter-bank market with remaining term to maturity over 1 year.

index_c_intro: 中证国债指数由银行间市场和沪深交易所市场的剩余期限1年以上的国债构成。
index_e_intro: CSI Treasury Bond Index consists of treasury bonds in the inter-bank and exchanges market with remaining term to maturity over 1 year.

index_c_intro: 中证10+债指数由在沪深证券交易所及银行间市场上市的剩余期限10年以上的国债、金融债及企业债构成。
index_e_intro: CSI Aggregate Bond 10+ Index consists of government bond, financial bond and corporate bond in the inter-bank and exchanges market with remaining term to maturity over 10 years.

index_c_intro: 中证10债指数由在沪深证券交易所及银行间市场上市的剩余期限7-10年的国债、金融债及企业债构成。
index_e_intro: CSI Aggregate Bond (7-10) Index consists of government bond, financial bond and corporate bond in the inter-bank and exchanges market with remaining term to maturity between 7-10 years.

index_c_intro: 中证7债指数由在沪深证券交易所及银行间市场上市的剩余期限3-7年的国债、金融债及企业债构成。
index_e_intro: CSI Aggregate Bond (3-7) Index consists of government bond, financial bond and corporate bond in the inter-bank and exchanges market with remaining term to maturity between 3-7 years.

index_c_intro: 中证3债指数由在沪深证券交易所及银行间市场上市的剩余期限1-3年的国债、金融债及企业债构成。
index_e_intro: CSI Aggregate Bond (1-3) Index consists of government bond, financial bond and corporate bond in the inter-bank and exchanges market with remaining term to maturity between 1-3 years.

index_c_intro: 中证全债指数是综合反映银行间债券市场和沪深交易所债券市场的跨市场债券指数，也是中证指数公司编制并发布的首只债券类指数。该指数的样本由上述两个市场的国债、金融债券及企业债券组成。
index_e_intro: As the first bond index developed by CSI, CSI Aggregate Bond Index consists of government bond, financial bond and corporate bond in the inter-bank and exchanges market with remaining term to maturity over 1 year.

index_c_intro: 中证光大阳光指数是中证指数公司根据光大证券的需求而开发的定制指数，该指数根据量化投资策略，挑选基本面优良、估值有吸引力、成长性好的股票作为指数样本，是国内证券市场第一只反映证券公司投资策略的股票指数。
index_e_intro: CSI Everbright Sunshine Index is customized for Everbright Securities. It consists of stocks with excellent fundamentals, attractive valuation and good growth ability.

index_c_intro: 中华交易服务中国跨境指数系列由中华证券交易服务有限公司(中华交易服务)委托中证指数有限公司(中证指数)进行编制，指数编制方案由中证指数以及中华交易服务共同确定。中华交易服务中国跨境指数系列为一系列股票价格指数，由中华交易服务中国120指数(中华120)、中华交易服务中国A80指数(中华A80)、中华交易服务中国香港内地指数(中华香港内地指数) 以及中华交易服务中国280指数(中华280)组成，以综合反映沪深港三地上市中国大、中盘股的整体表现。
index_e_intro: China Exchanges Services Company Ltd. (CESC) has appointed China Securities Index Co., Ltd. (CSIC) for index calculation, maintenance and dissemination. The index methodology is developed by mutual agreement between CESC and CSIC. CES China Cross Border Index series is a series of price return indices and includes CES CHINA 120 INDEX (CES 120), CES CHINA A80 INDEX (CES A80), CES CHINA HK MAINLAND INDEX (CES HKMI) and CES CHINA 280 INDEX (CES 280), the index series provides a measure of market performance for Chinese large and mid cap stocks listed on The Stock Exchange of Hong Kong Limited (SEHK), Shanghai Stock Exchange (SSE) and Shenzhen Stock Exchange (SZSE).
index_c_fullname: 中华交易服务中国A80指数

index_c_intro: 上证绿色公司债指数的样本由在上海证券交易所上市交易的绿色公司债组成，不包括私募和股债关联品种。指数基日为2016年12月30日，基点为100点，指数代码为950118，指数简称为上证绿色公司债。
index_e_intro: SSE Green Corporate Bond Index consists of green corporate bonds listed on Shanghai Stock Exchange(SSE), excluding private-placement bonds and equity-linked bonds.

index_c_intro: 上证绿色债券指数的样本由在上海证券交易所上市交易的绿色债券组成，不包括ABS、私募和股债关联品种。指数基日为2016年12月30日，基点为100点，指数代码为950117，指数简称为上证绿色债。
index_e_intro: SSE Green Bond Index consists of green bonds listed on Shanghai Stock Exchange(SSE), excluding ABSs, private-placement bonds and equity-linked bonds.

index_c_intro: 该指数样本券由在上海证券交易所市场挂牌、剩余期限位于3到5年之间且可质押的公司债和企业债组成。指数采用市值加权计算。
index_e_intro: This index is composed of enterprise bonds and corporate bonds trading on Shanghai Stock Exchange, with remaining term to final maturity between 3 and 5 years. This index is weighed by amount outstanding.
index_c_fullname: 上证3-5年期中高等级可质押信用债指数
index_e_fullname: SSE 3-5 Year Collateralizable Medium-High Grade Credit Bond

index_c_intro: 上证超长期国债指数样本券由在上海证券交易所上市的剩余期限为18年及以上的国债组成，并通过优化的方法确定样本券的权重，将上证超长期国债指数久期稳定在18年左右。
index_e_intro: SSE Extra Long Treasury Bond index’s constituents include the treasury bonds which time to maturity is over 18 years. The index duration is set to 18 years through the optimization method.
index_e_fullname: SSE Extra Long Treasury Bond Index

index_c_intro: 上证10年期地方政府债指数样本券由在上海证券交易所上市的剩余期限为6.5-10.25年的地方政府债组成，采用市值加权计算。
index_e_intro: SSE 10-Year Local Government Bond index's constituents include the local government Bond which time to maturity is between 6.5 and 10.25 years. SSE 10-Year Local Government Bond index is a market-value-weighted index.
index_c_fullname: 上证10年期地方政府债指数

index_c_intro: 上证380创新驱动指数指数根据企业创新投入和创新产出的指标，选取上证380中最具创新力的50只股票作为样本股，采用等权重加权方式，以反映上证中盘成长股中创新型上市公司的整体走势，并为投资者提供新的投资标的。
index_e_intro: SSE 380 Innovation Driven Index choose the top 50 stocks in universe of SSE 380 Index which have high innovation input and innovation output. The index is to measure the price performance of these innovative companies in mid-cap and small-cap stocks listed in SSE.

index_c_intro: 上证创新驱动主题指数根据企业创新投入和创新产出的指标，选取上证市场各个行业中最具创新力的100只股票作为样本股，采用等权重加权方式，以反映上证市场创新型上市公司的整体走势，并为投资者提供新的投资标的。
index_e_intro: SSE Innovation Driven Theme Index choose the top 100 stocks in A share stocks listed in SSE which have high innovation input and innovation output. The index is to measure the price performance of these innovative companies listed in SSE.
index_c_fullname: 上证创新驱动主题指数

index_c_intro: 上证证券行业指数选取沪市所有证券行业的股票作为样本股，采用自由流通市值加权，并对单个股票设置15%权重上限，以反映上证市场的证券行业上市公司在二级市场的整体表现。
index_e_intro: SSE Securities Sector Index choose all the securities sector stocks in A share stocks listed in SSE. The index is weighted by free float capitalization less than 15%, to measure the price performance of these securities sector companies listed in SSE.

index_c_intro: 上证周期产业债指数样本券由在上海证券交易所上市的公司债和企业债中发行主体为能源、材料、工业、公用事业、信息技术和可选消费行业的债券组成，采用市值加权计算。
index_e_intro: SSE Cycle Industry Bond Indexsamples include Energy, Raw material, Industry, Utility, IT and Consumption sector bond listed on SSE market. SSE Cycle Industry Bond Index is the market-value-weighted index.

index_c_intro: 上证智能制造主题指数选取为智能制造提供自动化、信息化、互联化、智能化的技术、产品、服务，以及其他与智能制造相关的公司，包括但不限于系统集成商、智能装备、工业数据库和云计算、工业生产软件、工业互联网、智能生产等代表性的沪市A股作为样本股，反映沪市智能制造主题公司的整体表现。
index_e_intro: SSE Intelligent Manufacturing Index is composed of A-Share stocks listed in SSE which belong to automation, information, intelligent companies and other related companies benefitting from intelligent manufacturing, including but not limited to system integrators, intelligent equipment, industrial database and cloud computing, industrial software, industrial Internet, intelligent production. The index is to measure the price performance of the theme, as well as to provide underlying for theme.
index_c_fullname: 上证智能制造主题指数

index_c_intro: 上证高股息精选指数从沪市A股选取50只流动性好、连续分红、股息率高、盈利持续且具有成长性的股票作为指数样本股，采用股息率加权，以反映沪市股息率高、盈利持续且具有成长性的股票的整体表现。
index_e_intro: SSE High Dividend Yield Select Index selects 50 Shanghai A-Share companies which are characterized by good liquidity, continuous dividend-paying record, high dividend yield, persistent earnings and growth, weighted by dividend yield. It aims to reflect the performance of Shanghai high dividend yield companies with persistent earnings and growth.
index_e_fullname: SSE High Dividend Yield Select Index

index_c_intro: 上证 380行业中性低波动指数在SSE 380指数二级行业内选取低波动特征的股票为样本，保持行业中性的同时，行业内股票采用波动率倒数加权。
index_e_intro: SSE 380 Sector Neutral Low Volatility Index selects low volatility stocks in CICS 2nd Level of SSE 380 as constituents. While maintaining industry-neutral, the stocks within the same industry are weighted by the inverse of volatility.
index_c_fullname: 上证380行业中性低波动指数
index_e_fullname: SSE 380 Sector Neutral Low volatility Index

index_c_intro: 上证180行业中性低波动指数在上证180指数一级行业内选取低波动特征的股票为样本，保持行业中性的同时，行业内股票采用波动率倒数加权。
index_e_intro: SSE 180 Sector Neutral Low Volatility Index selects low volatility stocks in CICS 1st Level of SSE 180 as constituents. While maintaining industry-neutral, the stocks within the same industry are weighted by the inverse of volatility.
index_c_fullname: 上证180行业中性低波动指数
index_e_fullname: SSE 180 Sector Neutral Low volatility Index

index_c_intro: 上证供给侧结构性改革主题指数选取建材、钢铁、化工、煤炭、石油开采、有色等行业的沪市A股作为样本，反映上证供给侧结构性改革主题公司整体表现。
index_e_intro: SSE Supply-Side Structural Reform Index is composed of the stocks from construction materials, chemicals, steel, coal, oil & gas, nonferrous metals industries. The Index is to measure the price performance of the theme, as well as to provide underlying for the theme.
index_c_fullname: 上证供给侧结构性改革主题指数

index_c_intro: 中证上海国企指数以上海市（含区县）国有企业上市公司为待选样本，结合市值、国资持股比例、分红比率、市场预期等情况进行选样并加权，反映上海国企的整体走势。
index_e_intro: CSI Shanghai SOEs Index is composed of SSE listed A-Share stocks which are regulated by Shanghai SASAC. The Index is weighted based upon market-cap, SASACs share ratio, dividend payout ratio and SOE reforms progress, to reflect Shanghai SOEs price performance.

index_c_intro: 上证定向增发事件指数选取正在发生或即将发生定向增发事件的沪市A股作为样本，反映该类事件在二级市场的整体表现，为事件驱动策略提供投资标的。
index_e_intro: SSE Private Placement Index is composed of A-Share stocks listed in SSE involving ongoing or coming capital event of private placement. The index is to measure the price performance of private placement event, as well as to provide underlying for event driven strategy.
index_c_fullname: 上证定向增发事件指数

index_c_intro: 上证增持与回购事件指数选取发生重要股东增持事件与回购事件的沪市A股作为样本，反映这两类事件在二级市场的整体表现，为事件驱动策略提供投资标的。
index_e_intro: SSE Holding-Increase & Buy-Back Index is composed of A-Share stocks listed in SSE involving ongoing or coming capital events of shareholding-increase and share buy-back. The index is to measure the price performance of these events, as well as to provide underlying for event driven strategy.
index_c_fullname: 上证增持与回购事件指数

index_c_intro: 上证轻资产主题指数以传媒、纺织服装、非银行金融、零售贸易、轻工制造、农林牧渔、电子、计算机、通讯、食品饮料和医药生物行业的100家沪市代表性公司作为成分股，采用市值加权，设置10%的权重上限。
index_e_intro: SSE Electronics Index selects no more than 50 stocks which belong to Semiconductor and Equipment, Computer Storage & Peripherals, Computer & Electronics Retail, Electronic Equipment Manufacturers, Electronic Manufacturing Services, Consumer Electronics which are listed on SSE. The index is weighted by market capitalization and individual weight cap is 10%.

index_c_intro: 上证轻资产主题指数以传媒、纺织服装、非银行金融、零售贸易、轻工制造、农林牧渔、电子、计算机、通讯、食品饮料和医药生物行业的100家沪市代表性公司作为成分股，采用市值加权，设置10%的权重上限。
index_e_intro: SSE Asset-light Index selects 100 stocks which belongs to the media, textiles and apparel, non-bank financials, retail, light manufacturing, agriculture, forestry, animal husbandry and fisheries, electronics, computer, communication, food & beverage, bio-pharmaceuticals which are listed on SSE. The index is weighted by market capitalization and tha individual weight cap is 10%.

index_c_intro: 上证海洋经济主题指数以船舶制造、风电设备、港口、海洋捕捞、航空装备、航天装备、航运Ⅲ、水产养殖、油气钻采服务等行业的至多50家沪市代表性公司作为成分股，采用市值加权，设置10%的权重上限。
index_e_intro: SSE Ocean Economy Index selects no more than 50 stocks include but not limit to Shipbuilding, wind power equipment, harbor, ocean fishing, aviation equipment, aerospace equipment, shipping, aquaculture, oil and gas drilling and service companies which are listed on SSE. The index is weighted by market capitalization and tha individual weight cap is 10%.
index_c_fullname: 上证海洋经济主题指数

index_c_intro: 上证自贸区主题指数以房地产开发、建筑材料、交通运输、商业贸易、金融、机械设备等行业且注册地为自贸区所在省（市）的至多80家沪市代表性公司为成分股，采用市值加权，设置5%的权重上限。
index_e_intro: SSE Free Trade Zone Index selects no more than 80 stocks include but not limit to real estate development, building materials, transportation, business and trade, financials, Machinery and equipment companies which are listed on SSE and are registered in the provinces(cities) where the FTZ is located. The index is weighted by market capitalization and tha individual weight cap is 5%.

index_c_intro: 上证物联网主题指数从为物联网提供基础硬件、软件、网络服务，内容及运维服务的公司中选取最大的50只股票作为样本股，采用自由流通市值加权方式，并对单个样本股设置5%的权重上限，以反映上证物联网概念上市公司股票的整体表现。
index_e_intro: SSE Internet of things Index selects the stocks which provide the basis for networking hardware, software, network services, content ,operation and maintenance services. The index is weighted by market capitalization.

index_c_intro: 上证改革发展主题指数以本地股为主要选样空间，在“一带一路”、“四个中心”、“自贸区建设”等战略的基础上，结合国企改革、产业升级、重点项目的推进情况，从相关受益板块中选取最具区域主题代表性的股票组成指数样本股，反映上海主题在A股的整体走势。
index_e_intro: SSE Shanghai’s Development Index consists of regional listed-companies which probably benefit from national strategies such as “OBOR”, “Construction of Four Centers” and “Free-Trade Zone Development” and local strategies such as SOEs reform, industrial upgrading and key projects. The index is to reflect the A-share performance of Shanghai regional themes and to provide investors with new underlying.
index_c_fullname: 上证上海改革发展主题指数

index_c_intro: 上证180碳效率指数是基于上市公司的碳足迹数据，在剔除碳足迹较高的股票之后，剩余股票按照碳足迹倒数进行加权，用以反映上海市场低碳排放公司的绩效。
index_e_intro: SSE 180 Carbon Efficient Index selects the low-carbon-footprint stocks as constituents based on Trucost Carbon footprint data and the stocks are weighted inversely proportionally to their carbon footprints. The Index is designated to reflect the performance of low carbon footprint stocks.

index_c_intro: 上证中小国企改革指数优选已被中央和地方国资委列为国企改革试点、或已出台相关重大资产重组方案、或已出台相关国企改革方案、或已完成国企改革的沪市国企上市公司，反映中小国企改革主题在沪市的整体走势。
index_e_intro:
SSE Small & Medium SOE’s Reform Index consists of most _x000D_
representative SSE-listed small & medium SOEs undertaking or set to undertake reforms and is free float market-cap weighted. The index is to reflect the SSE-listed small & medium SOE’s A-share performance under SOE’s reform theme and to provide investors with new underlying.
index_c_fullname: 上证中小国企改革指数
index_e_fullname: SSE Small Medium SOE's Reform Index

index_c_intro: 上证混合所有制改革指数优选已被中央和地方国资委列为混改试点、或已出台相关重大资产重组方案、或已出台国有股权转让方案、或已完成混改的沪市国企上市公司，反映混合所有制改革主题在沪市的整体走势。
index_e_intro: SSE Mixed-Ownership Reform Index consists of most representative SSE-listed SOEs undertaking or set to undertake mixed-ownership reforms and is free float market-cap weighted. The index is to reflect the SSE-listed A-share performance of SOEs mixed-ownership reform theme and to provide investors with new underlying.
index_c_fullname: 上证混合所有制改革指数

index_c_intro: 上证50指数由沪市A股中规模大、流动性好的最具代表性的50只股票组成，反映上海证券市场最具影响力的一批龙头公司的股票价格表现。
index_e_intro: SSE 50 Index consists of the 50 largest and most liquid A-share stocks listed on Shanghai Stock Exchange. The Index aims to reflect the overall performance of the most influential leading Shanghai stocks.
index_c_fullname: 上证50反向两倍杠杆指数

index_c_intro: 上证50指数由沪市A股中规模大、流动性好的最具代表性的50只股票组成，反映上海证券市场最具影响力的一批龙头公司的股票价格表现。
index_e_intro: SSE 50 Index consists of the 50 largest and most liquid A-share stocks listed on Shanghai Stock Exchange. The Index aims to reflect the overall performance of the most influential leading Shanghai stocks.

index_c_intro: 上证50指数由沪市A股中规模大、流动性好的最具代表性的50只股票组成，反映上海证券市场最具影响力的一批龙头公司的股票价格表现。
index_e_intro: SSE 50 Index consists of the 50 largest and most liquid A-share stocks listed on Shanghai Stock Exchange. The Index aims to reflect the overall performance of the most influential leading Shanghai stocks.

index_c_intro: 上证现代农业主题指数是选取涉及农业用地流转、农机、节水灌溉、农资服务、种子，养殖业，以及农业生产信息化、经营信息化、管理信息化、农业智能机械等公司作为样本股，采用等权重加权方式，以反映上海市场现代农业产业的走势，并为投资者提供新的投资标的。
index_e_intro: SSE modern agriculture Index selects the stocks which provide Circulation of agricultural land, farm machinery, irrigation, agricultural services, seeds, farming and agricultural production information, management information, management information, intelligent agricultural machinery are classified as index constituents. The index is designated to reflect the performance of modern agriculture stocks in shanghai stock exchange and to provide underlying for investors.
index_c_fullname: 上证现代农业主题指数

index_c_intro: 上证互联网金融主题指数选取涉及支付、融资、投资、保险、金融信息服务等互联网金融相关业务的上市公司股票作为成份股，以反映上海市场互联网金融相关上市公司整体表现，为市场提供多样化的投资标的。
index_e_intro: SSE Internet Finance Index selects 50 stocks with business in mobile terminal providers, mobile internet platform operators, merchandising and content service providers through mobile internet platform as constituents. The index is to reflect the price performance of internet finance industry and to provide underlying for investors.
index_c_fullname: 上证互联网金融主题指数

index_c_intro: 上证互联网主题指数选取互联网技术与软件，互联网平台运营商、互联网内容服务提供商，以及其他与互联网行业相关的沪市A股作为样本，反映沪市互联网产业公司整体表现。
index_e_intro: SSE internet Index is composed of stocks from the terminal providers，internet technology and software, the platform operator of internet, internet platform for merchandising, Internet content and service provider, and other companies benefitting from Internet. The index is to measure the price performance of the theme, as well as to provide underlying for the theme.

index_c_intro: 上证信息安全主题指数是选取提供信息安全技术、信息安全产品以及信息安全服务的公司，以及其他受益于信息安全产业发展的公司构成样本股，采用等权重加权方式，以反映上海市场信息安全产业的走势，并为投资者提供新的投资标的。
index_e_intro: SSE Information Security Index selects the stocks which provide Information Security technology, product and services, and others benefit from information security as index constituents. The index is designated to reflect the performance of Information Security Index stocks in shanghai stock exchange and to provide underlying for investors.
index_c_fullname: 上证信息安全主题指数

index_c_intro: 上证基建指数从基础建设、专业工程、工程机械、运输设备中选取具有代表性的公司作为成份股，采用自由流通市值加权方式，并对单个样本股设置15%的权重上限，以反映基础建设类上市公司股票的整体表现。
index_e_intro: SSE Infrastructure Index selects the stocks from Infrastructure, Professional Engineering, Engineering Machinery, Transportation equipment. The index is designated to reflect the performance of infrastructure stocks and to provide underlying for investors.

index_c_intro: 上证汽车指数从汽车行业中选取具有代表性的公司作为成份股，以反映汽车行业上市公司股票的整体表现。
index_e_intro: SSE Automobiles Index selects the stocks from automobiles industry. The index is designated to reflect the performance of automobiles stocks and to provide underlying for investors.

index_c_intro: 中证中金优选100指数从沪深A股中按照中证二级行业筛选出各行业内规模、流动性和营业收入整体水平靠前的股票作为股票池，然后从中选取ROE相对较高且稳定、分红能力较高同时兼具成长性的100只股票作为样本股。
index_e_intro: CSI CICC Select 100 Index includes the stocks with higher size, liquidity and operation revenue of each industry group as stock pool, and then selects 100 stocks which are characterized by sustained high ROE, high dividend yield and growth.

index_c_intro: 中证中金优选300指数从沪深A股中按照中证二级行业筛选出各行业内规模、流动性和营业收入整体水平靠前的股票作为股票池，然后从中选取ROE相对较高且稳定、分红能力较高同时兼具成长性的300只股票作为样本股。
index_e_intro: CSI CICC Select 300 Index includes the stocks with higher size, liquidity and operation revenue of each industry group as stock pool, and then selects 300 stocks which are characterized by sustained high ROE, high dividend yield and growth.

index_c_intro: 中证申万绩优策略指数从连续2年净资产收益率大于10%的股票中选取不超过100只最新净资产收益率最高的股票作为样本股，以自由流通市值加权。
index_e_intro: CSI SWS Quality Strategy Index selects no more than 100 stocks which are characterized by high roe from A-share stocks listed on Shanghai and Shenzhen Stock Exchange.
index_c_fullname: 中证申万绩优策略指数

index_c_intro: 中证中航军民融合主题指数选取符合军民融合主题的代表性上市公司，包括主营业务涉及军工产品和服务的军工集团下属公司或具有相关资质的民营企业，以及军民通用技术领域和特定行业的其他上市公司，反映军民融合在A股的整体表现。
index_e_intro: CSI AVIC Military-Civilian Integration Index is composed of A-Share stocks which are related to Military-Civilian Integration, including subsidiaries of the twelve large military group corporations or the qualified private enterprises whose revenues are from the aerospace defense industry, as well as those companies belong to the fields of dual-use technologies. The index is to measure the price performance of the theme, as well as to provide underlying for the theme.
index_c_fullname: 中证中航军民融合主题指数

index_c_intro: 中证创始人持续经营主题指数以民企200指数成分股为待选样本，剔除金融地产行业以及上市未满三年的股票，将创始家族持续参与经营管理上市公司的股票作为待选样本，从中选取日均市值最大的50只作为样本股，反映具备企业家精神、持续开展实体业务的代表性上市公司的整体股价走势。
index_e_intro: CSI Founder-Run Companies Index selects 50 biggest stocks of the founder-run companies in terms of market-cap as the constituents. The index is to reflect the overall price performance of largest entrepreneurial A-Share companies.
index_c_fullname: 中证创始人持续经营主题指数

index_c_intro: 中证质量成长低波动指数从沪深A股中选取50只盈利能力高且可持续、现金流量较为充沛且兼具成长性和低波动特征的股票作为指数样本股，采用波动率倒数加权，以反映沪深两市盈利能力高且可持续、现金流量较为充沛且兼具成长性和低波动特征上市公司的整体表现。
index_e_intro: CSI Quality and Growth Low Volatility Index selects 50 stocks which are characterized by high profitability, persistent earnings, abundant cash flow, growth and low volatility as constituents from A-share stocks listed on Shanghai and Shenzhen Stock Exchange. The Index is weighted by the inverse of volatility. It aims to reflect the overall performance of listed companies which are characterized by high profitability, persistent earnings, abundant cash flow, growth and low volatility.
index_c_fullname: 中证质量成长低波动指数
index_e_fullname: CSI Quality and Growth Low Volatility Index

index_c_intro: 中证时钟配置策略指数参考投资时钟理论，采用公开经济数据，判断经济周期所属阶段，从而形成对大类资产的预期观点，并通过Black-Litterman模型优化得到资产配置结果，可作为稳健型大类资产配置的参考基准。
index_e_intro: CSI Investment-Clock Allocation Index constructs multi-asset portfolio based on the Black-Litterman model. In this model, estimation of assets’ future performance is conducted according to the Investment-Clock theory. The index provides a benchmark for conservative asset allocation strategy.
index_c_fullname: 中证时钟配置策略指数

index_c_intro: 中证高等级同业存单指数样本券由在银行间市场上市的主体评级为AA+及以上、发行期限1年及以下、上市时间7天及以上的同业存单组成，采用市值加权计算。指数基日为2014年12月31日，基点为100点，指数代码为931060，指数简称为高等级同业存单。
index_e_intro: The CSI High Grade Negotiable Certificate of Deposit Index is composed of Interbank Negotiable Certificates listed on Inter-bank market, with issuer credit rate of AA+ or above, issue term of 1 year or less, and listed over 7 days.The index weight is calculated by market value. The index base date is Dec. 31st, 2014, and the base index is 100. Index code is 931060, shortened name is High Grade NCD.
index_c_fullname: 中证高等级同业存单指数
index_e_fullname: CSI High Grade Negotiable Certificate of Deposit Index

index_c_intro: 中证同业存单AAA指数样本券由在银行间市场上市的主体评级为AAA、发行期限1年及以下、上市时间7天及以上的同业存单组成，采用市值加权计算。指数基日为2014年12月31日，基点为100点，指数代码为931059，指数简称为同业存单AAA。
index_e_intro: The CSI Negotiable Certificate of Deposit AAA Index is composed of Interbank Negotiable Certificates listed on Inter-bank market, with issuer credit rate of AAA, issue term of 1 year or less, and listed over 7 days.The index weight is calculated by market value. The index base date is Dec. 31st, 2014, and the base index is 100. Index code is 931059, shortened name is NCD AAA.
index_e_fullname: CSI Negotiable Certificate of Deposit AAA Index

index_c_intro: 中证竞争优势主题指数基于无形资产、转换成本、成本优势、网络效应等维度，选取市场份额高、资本回报率高以及竞争优势大的50只股票作为样本股，反映具有宽护城河的上市公司整体走势，为投资者提供新的投资标的。
index_e_intro: CSI Competitive Advantage Index is based on four dimensions including Intangible Assets, Conversion Cost, Cost Advantage and Network Effects. It selects top 50 stocks which have high market shares, high ROIC and strong competitive advantage as constituents. The index is to measure the price performance of these companies which have strong competitive advantage in A share market, providing a new underlying for investors.
index_c_fullname: 中证竞争优势主题指数

index_c_intro: 中证股权激励主题指数选取正在实施或即将实施股权激励计划的沪深 A 股作为样本，反映该类事件在二级市场的整体表现，为事件驱动策略提供新的投资标的。
index_e_intro: CSI Equity Incentive Index is composed of A-Share stocks involving ongoing or upcoming capital event of equity incentive. The index is to measure the price performance of equity incentive events, as well as to provide a new an underlying for event driven strategies.
index_c_fullname: 中证股权激励主题指数

index_c_intro: 中证红利增长策略指数选取50只流动性好、分红总额连续增长、红利支付水平相较三年前没有下降且股息率高的股票作为指数样本股，采用股息率加权，以反映A股市场分红连续增长股票的整体表现。
index_e_intro: CSI Dividend Growth Strategy Index aims to reflect the performance of steady cash dividend growth companies.  The index is characterized by good liquidity, moderate dividend payout ratio, continuous dividend-paying record, positive dividend growth rate and high dividend yield, weighted by dividend yield.
index_c_fullname: 中证红利增长策略指数

index_c_intro: 中证财务稳健低波动指数从沪深A股中选取50只流动性好、财务较为稳健且波动率较低的股票作为指数样本股，采用波动率倒数加权，以反映沪深A股中财务较为稳健且波动率较低上市公司的整体表现。
index_e_intro: CSI Financial Health Low Volatility Index selects 50 stocks which are characterized by good liquidity, healthy financial position and low volatility as constituents from A-share stocks listed on Shanghai and Shenzhen Stock Exchange. The Index is weighted by the inverse of volatility. It aims to reflect the overall performance of listed companies which are characterized by healthy financial position and low volatility.
index_c_fullname: 中证财务稳健低波动指数
index_e_fullname: CSI Financial Health Low Volatility Index

index_c_intro: 中证财务稳健指数从沪深A股中选取100只流动性好且财务较为稳健的股票作为指数样本股，采用等权重加权方式，以反映沪深A股中财务较为稳健上市公司的整体表现。
index_e_intro: CSI Financial Health Index selects 100 stocks which are characterized by good liquidity and healthy financial position as constituents from A-share stocks listed on Shanghai and Shenzhen Stock Exchange. The Index is equally weighted. It aims to reflect the overall performance of listed companies which are characterized by healthy financial position.

index_c_intro: 中证中信高股息策略指数从沪深A股中选取80只流动性好、盈利稳定且预期股息率较高的股票作为指数样本股，采用预期股息率调整市值加权，以反映盈利稳定且预期股息率较高上市公司的整体表现。
index_e_intro: CSI CITIC High Dividend Yield Strategy Index selects 80 stocks which are characterized by good liquidity, stable profitability and high expected dividend yield as constituents from A-share stocks listed on Shanghai and Shenzhen Stock Exchange. The Index is weighted by expected dividend yield adjusted market capitalization. It aims to reflect the overall performance of listed companies which are characterized by stable profitability and high expected dividend yield.
index_c_fullname: 中证中信高股息策略指数
index_e_fullname: CSI CITIC High Dividend Yield Strategy Index

index_c_intro: 中证国信价值指数是从具有长期价值增长，即持续稳定的ROE大于资本机会成本的公司中，选取EP排名前100家公司作为最终样本，以反映价值类公司的整体表现。
index_e_intro: CSI GuoSen Value Index selected the 100 stocks with long term value,  stable and sustainable ROEs that exceed the opportunity cost of capital, and high EP.The index is to measure the price performance of the theme, as well as to provide underlying for theme.

index_c_intro: 沪深300绿色领先股票指数是在沪深300空间内剔除高污染、高耗能、产能过剩行业的公司，然后基于上市公司生产和服务流程的绿色水平的评价、绿色收入、负面新闻和环保处罚等计算公司的绿色领先评分，选取评分最高的100家公司作为最终样本，以反映绿色领先类公司的整体表现。
index_e_intro: CSI 300 Green Leading Stock Index measures the performance of 100 leading companies, engaged in the transition to a green economy, within CSI 300. After companies of high pollution and high energy consumption, as well as overcapacity being excluded, 100 components with highest green leading scores will be selected. The green leading score is evaluated by several merits including green performance, green revenue, negative news and environmental sanctions. The index provides underlying for green leading theme.
index_c_fullname: 沪深300绿色领先股票指数

index_c_intro: 中证南方养老目标日期指数由南方基金管理有限公司定制，基于人们在不同年龄段拥有的人力资本与金融财富水平，设置相应的风险承受水平，从而进行不同资产间的优化配置，为不同退休日期人群提供一站式养老储蓄的基准指数。
index_e_intro: According to how much human capital and financial capital people own in their life cycle, CSI CSAM Target Date Indices make asset allocation at corresponding risk tolerence level. In this way, the index series provide ‘one-stop’ nest egg underlyings for people with different retirement years. The indices are customized for China Southern Asset Management (CSAM).
index_c_fullname: 中证南方养老目标日期2045指数

index_c_intro: 中证南方养老目标日期指数由南方基金管理有限公司定制，基于人们在不同年龄段拥有的人力资本与金融财富水平，设置相应的风险承受水平，从而进行不同资产间的优化配置，为不同退休日期人群提供一站式养老储蓄的基准指数。
index_e_intro: According to how much human capital and financial capital people own in their life cycle, CSI CSAM Target Date Indices make asset allocation at corresponding risk tolerence level. In this way, the index series provide ‘one-stop’ nest egg underlyings for people with different retirement years. The indices are customized for China Southern Asset Management (CSAM).
index_c_fullname: 中证南方养老目标日期2035指数

index_c_intro: 中证南方养老目标日期指数由南方基金管理有限公司定制，基于人们在不同年龄段拥有的人力资本与金融财富水平，设置相应的风险承受水平，从而进行不同资产间的优化配置，为不同退休日期人群提供一站式养老储蓄的基准指数。
index_e_intro: According to how much human capital and financial capital people own in their life cycle, CSI CSAM Target Date Indices make asset allocation at corresponding risk tolerence level. In this way, the index series provide ‘one-stop’ nest egg underlyings for people with different retirement years. The indices are customized for China Southern Asset Management (CSAM).
index_c_fullname: 中证南方养老目标日期2025指数

index_c_intro: 中证杭州湾区指数从环杭州湾区域选取100只流动性好、盈利能力高且兼具成长性的股票作为指数样本股，采用自由流通市值加权，以反映环杭州湾区域上市公司的整体表现。
index_e_intro: CSI Hangzhou Bay Area Index selects 100 stocks which are characterized by good liquidity, high ROE and growth as constituents from Hangzhou Bay Area. The Index is weighted by free float market capitalization. It aims to reflect the overall performance of listed companies from Hangzhou Bay Area.

index_c_intro: 中证复兴发展100主题指数围绕国家富强、民族振兴、人民幸福等复兴发展的内涵，从改革开放、民生发展、国防军工等主题的公司中选取代表性的100家公司作为样本股，以反映复兴发展主题公司的整体表现。
index_e_intro: According to the connotation of revival development of country prosperous, national revitalization, people's happiness, CSI Revival Development 100 Index selects 100 stocks from the reform and opening up, wellbeing  development and national defense sectors.The index is to measure the price performance, as well as to provide an underlying for the theme.
index_c_fullname: 中证复兴发展100主题指数

index_c_intro: 中证北京50指数将北京市地方国有企业以及北京市的科技和文化产业上市公司作为待选样本，选取市值最大的50只股票作为样本股，采用自由流通市值加权，反映北京市属国企和科技文化产业上市公司的整体走势，为投资者提供新的投资标的。
index_e_intro: CSI Beijing 50 Index selects the 50 largest listed companies which are local state-owned enterprises or culture and technology industry enterprises headquartered in Beijing as constituents. The Index is weighted by free float capitalization, and it provides a new underlying for investors.

index_c_intro: 中证大气治理主题指数选取产品或服务与大气治理业务相关的上市公司股票作为样本股，包括但不限于大气治理设备、催化剂生产商、EPC工程设计、施工或运营等相关领域，反映大气治理相关的A股上市公司整体表现。
index_e_intro: CSI Atmospheric Protection Index is composed of A-Share stocks which relate to Atmospheric Prevention & Control business, including but not limited to atmospheric pollutant control equipment & catalyst manufacturer, Engineering Procurement Construction and Operation. The index is to measure the price performance of the theme.
index_c_fullname: 中证大气治理主题指数

index_c_intro: 中证家居家电主题指数选取经营范围与家居家电相关的上市公司股票作为样本股，包括但不限于冰箱、空调、洗衣机、彩电、小家电、家纺、家具以及卫浴、洁具等细分领域，反映家居家电主题公司的整体表现。
index_e_intro: CSI Home Decoration & Appliances Index is composed of A-Share stocks which related to home decoration & appliances, including but not limited to steel structure, building material, architectural decoration and other companies take part in home decoration & appliances. The index is to measure the price performance of the theme, as well as to provide underlying for the theme.
index_c_fullname: 中证家居家电主题指数

index_c_intro: 中证装配式建筑主题指数选取经营范围与装配式建筑相关的上市公司股票作为样本股，包括但不限于钢结构、建筑材料、装修装饰等领域，反映装配式建筑主题公司的整体表现。
index_e_intro: CSI Prefabricated Building Index is composed of A-Share stocks which related to Prefabricated building, including but not limited to steel structure, building material, architectural decoration and other companies take part in Prefabricated building. The index is to measure the price performance of the theme, as well as to provide underlying for the theme.

index_c_intro: 沪深300等权重月度调整指数与沪深300指数拥有相同的成份股，采用等权重加权，按月调整指数权重，个股与行业权重分布更为均匀，为投资者提供新的投资标的。
index_e_intro: CSI 300 Equal Weight Monthly Rebalance Index is composed of same constituents of CSI 300 Index. Every index constituent has an equal weight to create an evenly distributed benchmark.
index_c_fullname: 沪深300等权重月度调整指数
index_e_fullname: CSI 300 Equal Weight Monthly Rebalance Index

index_c_intro: 中证中金300等权波动率控制指数由股票、现金、国债共三类资产以一定的比例构成。股票资产仓位根据标的指数的波动率水平每月调整一次，以控制整个组合的风险暴露水平，获取较好的风险调整后收益。
index_e_intro: CSI CICC 300 Equal Weight Volatility Control Index comprises equity, cash and treasury. The index is rebalanced monthly based on the relationship between the realized volatility of the underlying equity index and the target risk level, in order to limit the risk exposure of the index portfolio and to obtain better risk-adjusted return.
index_c_fullname: 中证中金300等权波动率控制指数
index_e_fullname: CSI CICC 300 Equal Weight Volatility Control Index

index_c_intro: 中证汇率动态对冲指数系列模拟投资者以美元投资 A 股标的指数，并通过美元兑离岸人民币一个月远期的多头合约对冲相应汇率波动的投资策略。其中，汇率对冲比例基于利差和汇市动量趋势指标进行动态调整，远期合约每月底进行展期。
index_e_intro: CSI Currency Dynamic Hedged Indices hedge the currency exposure of the underlying index by taking long position in one-month USD-CNH forward. The hedge ratio is dynamically adjusted every month depending on the treasury spreads and the currency exchange rate between China and US, in order to gain earnings from currency fluctuation.
index_c_fullname: 中证1000汇率动态对冲指数

index_c_intro: 中证汇率动态对冲指数系列模拟投资者以美元投资 A 股标的指数，并通过美元兑离岸人民币一个月远期的多头合约对冲相应汇率波动的投资策略。其中，汇率对冲比例基于利差和汇市动量趋势指标进行动态调整，远期合约每月底进行展期。

index_c_intro: 中证中信稳健成长策略指数是由中信证券股份有限公司定制开发的策略指数，结合成长和价值指标从沪深上市公司中选取样本股。指数采用月度调样，动态跟踪具有持续增长潜力但价格合理或低估的股票。
index_e_intro: CSI CITIC Sustaining Growth index is customized for CITIC Securities, which selects stocks according to growth and value indicators, adjusted and rebalanced monthly. The index seeks to find stocks with both growth potential and valuation advantage.
index_c_fullname: 中证中信稳健成长策略指数

index_c_intro: 中证国开成长50指数以中证全指指数样本股中，公开披露与国家开发银行及其下属机构具有金融服务合作关系的上市公司为样本空间，从中选取主题得分、营业收入增长率、毛利率增长率、净资产收益率、资产周转率指标综合排名最靠前的50只股票作为样本股。
index_e_intro: CSI GuoKai Growth 50 Index is composed of stocks which have publicly disclosed financial service cooperation with China Development Bank (CDB) and its affiliates and of good operating revenue growth rate, gross profit margin growth rate, return on net assets and asset turnover rate performance.

index_c_intro: 中证多资产风险平价指数通过优化权重配置，实现股票、债券、黄金大类资产对组合的风险贡献相同的策略，为机构投资者进行资产配置提供多元化的投资工具。
index_e_intro: CSI Multi Asset Risk Parity Index is composed of Equity, Bond and Gold asset，and each asset has equal risk contribution to portfolio. The index provides the diversification investment tools for institutional investors asset allocation.
index_c_fullname: 中证多资产风险平价指数
index_e_fullname: CSI Multi Asset Risk Parity Index

index_c_intro: 中证财新新动能指数依据财务健康评分，非固定资产评分，从新经济相关行业中选取300只股票作为成份股，以反映新经济相关上市公司的整体表现，为投资者提供追踪新经济发展的投资工具。
index_e_intro: CSI Caixin New Economic Engine Index selects 300 stocks from new economy industries according to the financial health score and the non-fixed assets score. The index is to measure the price performance of companies from new economy industries, as well as to provide underlying for investors.
index_e_fullname: CSI CAIXIN New Economic Engine Index

index_c_intro: 中证财新基石经济指数依据企业规模评分、财务健康评分以及低风险评分，对上市公司股票进行逐层筛选，最终选取300只股票作为成份股，以反映兼具经济规模和低风险特征的上市公司整体表现。
index_e_intro: CSI Caixin Bedrock Economy Index selects 300 stocks from listed companies according to the size score, financial health score and low risk score. The index is to measure the price performance of companies with efficient size and low risk, as well as to provide underlying for investors.
index_c_fullname: 中证财新基石经济指数

index_c_intro: 中证10年期国债指数的样本券由同时在银行间和上海证券交易所市场挂牌、且剩余期限位于8.5到10年之间的国债组成。该指数采用非市值加权计算。
index_e_intro: This index consists of Treasury Notes listed simultaneously on SSE and Inter-bank market, with a remaining term to final maturity between 8.5 and 10 years. This is the non-cap-weighted index.

index_c_intro: 中证房地产债指数样本券由在上海证券交易所上市的公司债和企业债中发行主体为房地产行业的债券组成，采用市值加权计算。
index_e_intro: CSI Real Estate Bond Index’s constituents include Real Estate sector bonds listed on SSE. CSI Real Estate Bond Index is a market-value-weighted index.

index_c_intro: 中证软商品期货成份指数基于国内商品市场特点及国内外主流分类标准，选择国内商品市场中与软商品相关的品种作为样本，从细分市场的角度反映商品期货的运行特征。
index_e_intro: CSI Soft Commodity Futures Index reflects the performance of the soft commodity, which provides investment tool for investors.
index_c_fullname: 中证软商品期货成份指数

index_c_intro: 中证贵金属产业指数选取涉及黄金、白银和铂金等贵金属采掘与冶炼、加工与销售的上市公司股票作为样本股，以反映贵金属类相关上市公司整体表现，为市场提供投资贵金属的多样化选择。
index_e_intro: CSI Precious Metals Industry Index selects no more than 50 stocks with main business in precious metals mining and smelting industry, precious metals processing and marketing industry as constituents. The index is to measure the price performance of precious metals industry, as well as to provide underlying for investors.

index_c_intro: 中证政府和社会资本合作（PPP）主题指数选取100家涉及政府和社会资本合作项目，且主营业务涉及污水和垃圾处理、轨道交通、医疗、教育和养老服务设施、城市供水、供暖、供气、保障性安居工程以及基础设施建设等业务的上市公司股票作为样本股，以反映与PPP模式相关的上市公司的整体表现。
index_e_intro: CSI Public-Private Partnership (PPP) Thematic Index selects 100 stocks which participate in the PPP projects as constituents. And the main business of stocks involve sewage and garbage disposal, rail transportation, health care, education and pension service facilities, city water supply, heating, gas supply, affordable housing projects and infrastructure construction. The index is to measure the price performance of companies which have PPP mode, as well as to provide underlying for investors.
index_c_fullname: 中证政府和社会资本合作（PPP）主题指数

index_c_intro: 中证A股指数由沪深两市全部A股组成，并剔除暂停上市的A股，指数以自由流通股本加权计算，综合反映A股上市股票价格的整体表现，具有较高的市场代表性，可作为投资标的和业绩评价基准。
index_e_intro: CSI China A Share Index is composed of all A Share stocks except securities that have temporarily suspended from listing. The Index is weighted by free-float market capitalization to reflect price performance of A Share stocks.

index_c_intro: 中证大数据产业指数选取涉及大数据存储设备、大数据分析技术、大数据运营平台、大数据生产、大数据应用等领域的沪深A股作为样本，采用自由流通股本加权，设置10%的权重上限。
index_e_intro: CSI Big Data Industry index is composed of A-Share stocks involving Big Data Storage Devices, Big Data Platform, Big Data Producing and Big Data application Services etc. The Index is weighted by free float capitalization less than 10%.

index_c_intro: 中证动漫游戏指数选取主营业务涉及动画、漫画、游戏等相关细分娱乐产业的沪深A股作为样本，采用自由流通股本加权，设置5%的权重上限。
index_e_intro: CSI Anime Comic & Game Index is composed of A-Share stocks involving Anime, Comic, Game and other companies benefiting from ACG industry. The Index is weighted by free float capitalization less than 5%.

index_c_intro: 中证500创新驱动指数指数根据企业创新投入和创新产出的指标，选取中证500中最具创新力的100只股票作为样本股，采用等权重加权方式，以反映A股中小盘股中创新型上市公司的整体走势，并为投资者提供新的投资标的。
index_e_intro: CSI 500 Innovation Driven Index choose the top 100 stocks in universe of CSI 500 Index which have high innovation input and innovation output. The index is to measure the price performance of these innovative companies in mid-cap and small-cap share market.

index_c_intro: 沪深300创新驱动指数指数根据企业创新投入和创新产出的指标，选取沪深300中最具创新力的100只股票作为样本股，采用等权重加权方式，以反映A股大盘股中创新型上市公司的整体走势，并为投资者提供新的投资标的。
index_e_intro: CSI 300 Innovation Driven Index choose the top 100 stocks in universe of CSI 300 Index which have high innovation input and innovation output. The index is to measure the price performance of these innovative companies in large-cap share market.

index_c_intro: 中证创新驱动主题指数根据企业创新投入和创新产出的指标，选取沪深两市各个行业中最具创新力的300只股票作为样本股，采用等权重加权方式，以反映A股市场创新型上市公司的整体走势，并为投资者提供新的投资标的。

index_c_intro: 中证珠三角沿海区域发展主题指数根据总市值、净利润增长率和营业总收入三项指标，选取沪深两市中注册地在广东、福建、广西的最具代表性的100只股票作为样本股，采用等权重加权方式，以反映珠三角沿海区域股票的整体走势，并为投资者提供新的投资标的。
index_e_intro: CSI Zhujiang Delta Coastal Area Development Index is composed of the top 100 stocks which are registered in Guangdong, Fujian or Guangxi province according to market capitalization, net profit growth rate and gross revenue. index_e_fullname: CSI Zhujiang Delta Coastal Area Development Index

index_c_intro: 中证空天一体军工指数选取主营业务与空天一体战略高度相关的上市公司或相关细分领域的龙头上市公司作为样本股，包括但不限于飞行器、动力及控制系统、预警系统、武器装备系统、C4ISR系统、军工数字化、军用航空航天材料以及其他与空天一体战略相关的技术，反映空天一体战略相关的上市公司整体表现。
index_e_intro: CSI Aerospace Defense Index is composed of A-Share stocks which relate to aerospace defense strategy and related fields, including but not limited to dynamical and control systems, early warning systems, weapons and equipment systems, C4ISR systems, military industrial digitization, military aviation & aerospace materials and other technologies. index_e_intro: On the basis of web discussion and virtual portfolios information provided by Chinese investment social platform Snowball (www.xueqiu.com), CSI Snowball Big Data 100 Index implements the momentum and reversal strategies, in order to seek the valuable equity at the reasonable price and to filter out the overheated sectors as well.
index_c_fullname: 中证雪球智选大数据100指数

index_c_intro: 中证雪球领先组合100指数对粉丝数最多的雪球用户，基于其自选组合的历史业绩以及用户线上活跃度，逐个进行评分。在此基础上，结合用户针对单个股票在每月其自选组合中的持仓比例与调仓幅度，对个股进行综合评分。最后，选取综合评分最高的100只股票作为指数成分股。
index_e_intro: On the basis of the investment social platform of Snowball (www.xueqiu.com), CSI evaluates each registered user’s corresponding virtual portfolios’ historical performance and his/her online activity degree at Snowball, and hence conducts his/her investment ability regarding certain stock. Based upon that, CSI calculates each candidate stock’s holding GP (Grade Point) and trading GP over the past month, and hence conducts its overall GP. Finally, select 100 candidate stocks with the highest overall GP to compose the CSI Snowball Leading Portfolio 100 Index.
index_c_fullname: 中证雪球领先组合100指数

index_e_intro: CSI Education Industry Index selects stocks that produce teaching materials, stationery materials & learning tools, provide technical and operating solutions for education institutions and provide teaching platform etc. The index is to reflect the price performance of education industry stocks and to provide underlying for investors.

index_c_intro: 中证现代物流指数选取专业品物流、供应链物流、冷链和农产品物流、仓储服务、物流信息化和电商平台等提供现代物流服务的代表性公司作为样本股， 采用自由流通市值加权方式，并对单个样本股设置5%的权重上限，以反映现代物流上市公司股票的整体表现。
index_e_intro: CSI Modern Logistics Index selects the stocks that belong to special products logistics, supply chains logistics, cold chain logistics, agriculture products logistics, warehousing services, logistics information, e-commerce platform, etc. The index is designated to reflect the performance of modern logistics stocks and to provide underlying for investors.

index_c_intro: 中证朝阳永续超预期88指数从分析师行为、上市公司业绩预告以及研究报告文本挖掘三个维度筛选出具有超预期线索的股票，并依据一致预期净利变化、一致预期盈利能力变化以及一致预期成长性三类因子综合打分，选取综合评分最高的88只股票作为成份股，以追求更优的收益风险特征。
index_e_intro: CSI Suntime Beyond Expectation 88 Index selects 88 stocks based on analysts’ behavior, company performance forecasts and research report text mining as constituents. The index is to measure the price performance of beyond expectation stocks, as well as to provide underlying for investors.

index_c_intro: 中证创投主题指数选取园区类上市公司，以及参股或控股的创投公司净利润占该上市公司净利润5%以上的公司作为样本股，以反映创投行业公司的整体表现。
index_e_intro: CSI Venture Capital Index is composed of A-Share stocks which belong to industrialpark, Shares or holding Ventures as index constituents. The index is to measure the price performance of the theme, as well as to provide underlying for theme.

index_c_intro: 中证现代农业主题指数以中证全指为样本空间，选取涉及农业用地流转、农机、节水灌溉、农资服务、种子，养殖业，以及农业生产信息化、经营信息化、管理信息化、农业智能机械等业务的上市公司股票作为成份股，以反映现代农业类相关上市公司整体表现，为市场提供多样化的投资标的。
index_e_intro: CSI Modern Agriculture Index selects 100 stocks with business in agricultural land, farm machinery, irrigation, agricultural services, seeds, farming and agricultural production information, management information, management information, intelligent agricultural machinery as constituents. index_c_intro: 中证电子指数以中证全指为样本空间，选取涉及半导体产品与设备生产、电脑存储与外围设备生产、电脑与电子产品零售、电子设备制造、电子制造服务和消费电子生产等业务的上市公司股票作为成份股，以反映电子类相关上市公司整体表现，为市场提供多样化的投资标的。

index_c_intro: 中证海洋经济主题指数是选取船舶制造、风电设备、港口、海洋捕捞、航空装备、航天装备、航运III、水产养殖、油气钻采服务等代表性公司作为样本股，采用等权重加权方式，以反映上市公司中受益于海洋经济发展股票的走势，并为投资者提供新的投资标的。

index_c_intro: 中证智能消费主题指数选取电信业务、可选消费、信息技术、医药卫生、主要消费等行业内与智能消费相关的公司，包括但不限于智能穿戴、智能家居、互联网医疗、智能汽车，以及其他受益于智能消费发展的代表性沪深A股作为样本股，反映智能消费公司的整体表现。

index_c_intro: 中证全指证券公司指数选取中证全指样本股中至多50只证券公司行业股票组成，以反映该行业股票的整体表现。

index_c_intro: 中证国有企业改革指数选择已发生及拟发生改革的具有代表性的国有企业股票作为样本股，以反映受益于国企改革的企业的整体表现。

index_c_intro: 中证国防指数是从隶属于十大军工集团公司旗下的上市公司，以及为国家武装力量提供武器装备，或与军方有实际装备承制销售金额或签订合同的相关上市公司中选取不超过50只股票作为样本股，以反映国防公司股票的走势。
index_e_intro: CSI Defense Index consists of up to 50 companies which are controlled by the 10 largest military group corporations or are weapons and equipments providers for the army. CSI Defense Index reflects the performance of defense industry stocks.

index_c_intro: 沪深300深市指数是由沪深300指数样本股中所有深市股票构成样本股，反映沪深300指数中深市股票的整体走势。
index_e_intro: CSI 300 SZSE Stocks Index consists of the constituents of CSI 300 Index which are listed on Shenzhen Stock Exchange.

index_c_intro: 中证传媒指数聚焦传媒行业，从可选消费和信息技术中与传媒相关的公司股票中选取不超过50只股票组成，反映传媒行业公司股票的走势。
index_e_intro: CSI Media Index consists of no more than 50 stocks from the media-related companies in consumer discretionary and information technology sectors, and reflects the performance of Media industry stocks.

index_c_intro: 中证移动互联网指数从移动终端提供商、移动互联网平台运营商、通过移动互联网平台商品销售商和内容服务提供商，以及其他受益于移动互联的公司中选取100家组成样本股，以反映移动互联网相关产业公司股票的走势。
index_e_intro: CSI Mobile Internet Index consists of the largest 100 stocks from the mobile terminal providers, the platform operator of mobile Internet, mobile Internet content and service provider, and other companies benefitting from mobile Internet. The Index is designated to reflect the performance of mobile Internet stocks and to provide underlying for investors.

index_c_intro: 中证军工指数由十大军工集团控股的且主营业务与军工行业相关的上市公司以及其他主营业务为军工行业的上市公司作为指数样本，反映军工行业上市公司的整体表现。
index_e_intro: CSI National Defense Industry Index is designed to track the performance of national defense industry stocks. The Index consists of the companies which are controlled by the 10 largest military group corporations or operating in the national defense industry.

index_c_intro: 中证800证券保险指数，以中证800样本股为样本空间，选取行业为综合金融和保险的上市公司组成样本股。
index_e_intro: CSI 800 Financials(ex Banks) Index consists of all the constituents of CSI 800 Index that are in the diversified financials and insurance industry groups.

index_c_intro: 中证800地产指数选取中证800样本股中地产行业的上市公司组成。
index_e_intro: CSI 800 Real Estate Index consists of all the constituents of CSI 800 Index that are in the real estate industry group.

index_c_intro: 中证中航军工指数选取航天军工主题公司股票组成样本股，以反映此类股票的整体走势。

index_c_intro: 中证大农业指数选取食品分销商、食品零售、软饮料、农产品、包装食品与肉类（乳品除外）、化肥与农用药剂、林业产品等行业以及农用机械、兽药、动物疫苗以及土地流转等与农业相关代表性公司股票作为指数样本股。采用自由流通调整市值加权，并对个股设置6%的权重上限。

index_c_intro: 深证基本面200指数以深市A股为样本空间，分别挑选基本面价值最大的200家上市公司作为样本。基本面价值由四个财务指标来衡量，并决定了样本股的权重。
index_e_intro: SZFI 200 Index consists of top 200 SZSE-listed stocks ranked by fundamental value, which is calculated by 4 financial factors (Revenue, Cash Flow, Book Value and Dividends). And the weights of constituents are also decided by the fundamental value rather than the capitalization.

index_c_intro: 深证基本面60指数以深市A股为样本空间，分别挑选基本面价值最大的60家上市公司作为样本。基本面价值由四个财务指标来衡量，并决定了样本股的权重。

index_c_intro: 中证超级大盘指数从沪深300指数样本股中挑选规模最大的50只股票组成样本股，以综合反映沪深证券市场中最具市场影响力的一批超大市值公司的整体状况。指数采用等权重加权。
index_e_intro: CSI Mega-Cap Index consists of the largest 50 stocks by market capitalization within the universe of CSI 300 Index. The Index aims to track the performance of mega-cap companies in Shanghai and Shenzhen stock markets. The Index is equally weighted.

index_c_intro: 中证大宗商品股票指数选取中证800指数样本股中总市值最大的100家大宗商品类公司股票组成，采取等权重加权方式，以反映大宗商品类股票的整体表现。
index_e_intro: CSI Commodity Equity Index consists of the largest 100 constituents of CSI 800 Index. The CSI Commodity Equity Index is equally weighted and aims to reflect the commodity stocks performance in the markets.
index_c_fullname: 中证大宗商品股票指数

index_c_intro: 中证医药100指数选取医药卫生和药品零售行业市值较大的100只股票组成，以反映医药相关行业的公司股票的整体走势。
index_e_intro: CSI Health Care 100 Index tracks the performance of health care industry stocks traded in SSE and SZSE.

index_c_intro: 中证内地低碳经济主题指数从沪深A股中挑选日均总市值较高的50只低碳经济主题公司股票组成样本股，以反映低碳经济类公司股票的整体走势。
index_e_intro: CSI China Mainland Low Carbon Economy Index tracks the performance of stocks that are engaged in low Carbon economy. The largest 50 stocks in low-carbon-economy themes are selected as constituents.
index_c_fullname: 中证内地低碳经济主题指数
index_e_fullname: CSI China Mainland Low Carbon Economy Index

index_c_intro: 中证钱江30指数根据总市值、营业收入以及净资产收益率三个指标选取30只浙江市场上市公司股票为样本，以反映具备浙江经济代表性的企业的整体表现。
index_e_intro: CSI QianJiang 30 Index selects 30 stocks that are registrated in Zhejiang province based on total market capitalization, operating revenues and return on equity, which reflects the overall performance of enterprises of Zhejiang Province.

index_c_intro: 沪深300沪市指数是由沪深300指数样本股中所有沪市股票构成样本股，反映沪深300指数中沪市股票的整体走势。
index_e_intro: CSI 300 SSE Stocks Index consists of the constituents of CSI 300 Index which are listed on Shanghai Stock Exchange.

index_c_intro: 中证等权重90是由上证50指数样本股和按照上证 50 选样方法在深圳市场中选出的 40 只股票组成组成，以综合反映沪深两市规模大、流动性好的90家公司的整体表现。
index_e_intro: CSI Equal Weight 90 Index is the combination of the SSE 50 Index and 40 SZSE-listed stocks. The Index reflects the performance of the leading enterprises in Shanghai and Shenzhen securities markets.

index_c_intro: 中证ECPI ESG可持续发展40指数根据ECPI ESG评级方法，从上证180公司治理指数样本股中挑选ESG（环境、社会、公司治理）评级较高的40只公司股票组成样本股，以反映上证180公司治理指数中ECPI ESG评级较高公司股票的走势。
index_e_intro: CSI ECPI ESG China 40 Index consists of the top 40 constituents of SSE 180 Corporate Governance Index rated by ECPI ESG method. Hence to reflect the performance of highly ESG-rated company stocks performance.
index_c_fullname: 中证ECPI ESG可持续发展40指数

index_c_intro: 沪深300非周期行业指数以沪深300指数样本股为样本空间，选取金融保险、采掘、交通运输仓储、金属非金属、房地产以外行业的股票组成样本股。
index_e_intro: CSI 300 Non-Cyclical Index selects constituents of CSI 300 Index from non-cyclical sectors which are not Finance and Insurance, Mining, Transportation, Metals & non-Metals or Real Estate.

index_c_intro: 沪深300周期行业指数以沪深300指数样本股为样本空间，选取归属金融保险、采掘、交通运输仓储、金属非金属、房地产等5个具有较强周期性特征行业的股票构成样本股。
index_e_intro: CSI 300 Cyclical Index selects constituents of CSI 300 Index from cyclical sectors such as Finance and Insurance, Mining, Transportation, Metals & non-Metals and Real Estate.

index_c_intro: 中证锐联基本面200指数以沪深A股为样本空间，挑选基本面价值最大的600家上市公司作为样本。
index_e_intro: CSI RAFI 600 Index consists of top 600 stocks ranked by fundamental value, which is calculated by 4 financial factors (Revenue, Cash Flow, Book Value and Dividends). And the weights of constituents are also decided by the fundamental value rather than the capitalization.

index_c_intro: 中证锐联基本面200指数以沪深A股为样本空间，挑选基本面价值排名第201至第600的400家上市公司作为样本。
index_e_intro: CSI RAFI 400 Index consists of the next 400 stocks after top 200 ranked by fundamental value, which is calculated by 4 financial factors (Revenue, Cash Flow, Book Value and Dividends). And the weights of constituents are also decided by the fundamental value rather than the capitalization.

index_c_intro: 中证锐联基本面200指数以沪深A股为样本空间，挑选基本面价值最大的200家上市公司作为样本。
index_e_intro: CSI RAFI 200 Index consists of top 200 stocks ranked by fundamental value, which is calculated by 4 financial factors (Revenue, Cash Flow, Book Value and Dividends). And the weights of constituents are also decided by the fundamental value rather than the capitalization.

index_c_intro: 中证新兴产业指数是选择规模大、流动性好的100家新兴产业公司组成，以综合反映沪深市中新兴产业公司的整体表现。
index_e_intro: CSI Emerging Industries Index consists of 100 of the largest emerging industries companies stocks. The Index aims to comprehensively reflect the performance of emerging industries stocks.

index_c_intro: 中证下游消费与服务产业指数从中证800指数样本股中挑选规模大、具有下游消费与服务产业特征的公司股票组成样本股。
index_e_intro: CSI Downstream Consumption and Services Industry Index consists of all the constituents of CSI 800 Index that are in the downstream consumer industries. It aims to reflect the overall performance of the downstream industry stocks.
index_c_fullname: 中证下游消费与服务产业指数
index_e_fullname: CSI Downstream Consumption and Services Industry Index

index_c_intro: 中证中游制造产业指数从中证800指数样本股中挑选规模大、具有中游制造产业特征的公司股票组成样本股。
index_e_intro: CSI Midstream Manufacturing Industry Index consists of all the constituents of CSI 800 Index that are in the midstream manufacture industries. It aims to reflect the overall performance of the midstream industry stocks.
index_c_fullname: 中证中游制造产业指数

index_c_intro: 中证上游资源产业指数从中证800指数样本股中挑选规模大、具有上游资源产业特征的公司股票组成样本股。
index_e_intro: CSI Upstream resources Industry Index consists of all the constituents of CSI 800 Index that are in the upstream resources industries. It aims to reflect the overall performance of the upstream industry stocks.
index_c_fullname: 中证上游资源产业指数

index_c_intro: 中证龙头企业指数由沪深A股各二级行业中规模大、市场占有率高的龙头公司股票组成，以反映沪深A股各行业龙头公司股票的整体表现。
index_e_intro: CSI Industry Top Index is comprised of the largest companies in each industry and is designated to reflect the performance of publicly listed leading companies.

index_c_intro: 中证银河99指数以沪深300指数样本股为样本空间，根据量化投资策略，挑选99只具有市值代表性和良好成长性的股票组成样本股。
index_e_intro: CSI Galaxy 99 Index consists of 99 constituents of CSI 300 Index with good representatives in market capitalizations and good growth characteristics.

index_c_intro: 中证创业成长指数样本由具备创业和高成长特征的100只股票组成，旨在刻画沪深两市创业和成长特征较为显著的中小型上市股票群体的整体表现。
index_e_intro: CSI Innovative and Growing Enterprises Index is composed of 100 constituents which are selected on a basis of innovative and high-growth features. The Index is designed to reflect the overall performance of small and mid-sized enterprises stocks with significant features of innovation and high-growth.
index_e_fullname: CSI Innovative and Growing Enterprises Index

index_c_intro: 沪深300运输指数由沪深300指数中的运输行业股票组成，以反映该行业公司股票的整体表现。
index_e_intro: CSI 300 Transportation Index includes all stocks within the transportation industry group of CSI 300 Index, aims to reflect the overall performance of the this industry group.

index_c_intro: 中证国有企业200指数由中证地方国有企业100指数和中证中央企业100指数组合而成，全面刻画了沪深两市大型国企上市公司股票的整体表现。
index_e_intro: CSI State-owned Enterprises 200 Index is comprised of CSI Local State-owned Enterprises 100 Index and CSI Central State-owned Enterprises 100 Index, which reflects the performance of leading state-owned companies.

index_c_intro: 中证国有企业综合指数由中证地方国有企业综合指数和中证中央企业综合指数组合而成，全面刻画了沪深两市全部国有企业上市公司股票的整体表现。
index_e_intro: CSI State-owned Enterprises Composite Index is comprised of CSI Local State-owned Enterprises Composite Index and CSI Central State-owned Enterprises Composite Index, which reflects the performance of all the listed state-owned companies.
index_c_fullname: 中证国有企业综合指数

index_c_intro: 中证地方国有企业100指数挑选沪深两市最具代表性的100家地方国有企业上市公司股票为样本，刻画了沪深两市大型地方国有企业上公司股票的整体表现。
index_e_intro: CSI Local State-owned Enterprises 100 Index consists of 100 of the largest and most liquid constituents of CSI Local State-owned Enterprises Composite Index, which aims to comprehensively reflect the performance of the leading local state-owned enterprises.
index_c_fullname: 中证地方国有企业100指数

index_c_intro: 中证地方国有企业综合指数由沪深两市全部地方国有企业上市公司组成，旨在全面刻画沪深两市地方国有企业上市公司股票的整体表现。
index_e_intro: CSI Local State-owned Enterprises Composite Index consists of all the local state-owned enterprises stocks, which aims to reflect the overall performance of the category.
index_c_fullname: 中证地方国有企业综合指数
index_e_fullname: CSI Local State-owned Enterprises Composite Index

index_c_intro: 沪深300地产指数由沪深300指数中的地产行业股票组成，以反映该行业公司股票的整体表现。
index_e_intro: CSI 300 Real Estate Index consists of all the constituents of CSI 300 Index that are in the real estate industry. It aims to reflect the overall performance of this particular industry.

index_c_intro: 沪深300银行指数由沪深300指数中的银行行业股票组成，以反映该行业公司股票的整体表现。
index_e_intro: CSI 300 Banks Index includes all stocks within the banks industry group of CSI 300 Index, aims to reflect the overall performance of the this industry group.

index_c_intro: 沪深300基建主题指数由沪深300样本股中的基建类股票组成，以反映基建类公司股票的整体表现。
index_e_intro: CSI 300 Infrastructure Index selects infrastructure companies stocks within the universe of CSI 300 Index as constituents, it is designed to reflect the performance of A-shares listed infrastructural companies. CSI 300 Infrastructure Total Return Index reflects the returns generated by both price changes and dividend payments, whereas CSI 300 Infrastructure Index neglects the effects of dividends upon returns.

index_c_intro: 中证内地农业主题指数由中证800指数中的农产品、化肥与农用药剂等行业、农用机械等行业公司股票组成样本股。
index_e_intro: CSI China Mainland Agricultural Index consists of the constituents of CSI 800 Index that are in the fertilizers & agricultural chemicals, agricultural products, farm machinery or packaged foods & meats industries.
index_c_fullname: 中证内地农业主题指数

index_c_intro: 中证内地地产主题指数由中证800指数中的房地产行业公司股票组成样本股。
index_e_intro: CSI China Mainland Real Estate Index consists of the constituents of CSI 800 Index that are in the real estate industry.
index_c_fullname: 中证内地地产主题指数
index_e_fullname: CSI China Mainland Real Estate Index

index_c_intro: 中证内地银行主题指数由中证800指数中的银行股票组成样本股。
index_e_intro: CSI China Mainland Banks Index consists of the constituents of CSI 800 Index that are in the banks industry.
index_c_fullname: 中证内地银行主题指数

index_c_intro: 中证内地金融主题指数由中证800指数中的金融行业公司股票组成样本股。
index_e_intro: CSI China Mainland Financials Index consists of the constituents of CSI 800 Index that are in the financials sector.
index_c_fullname: 中证内地金融主题指数

index_c_intro: 中证内地运输主题指数由中证800指数中的运输行业公司股票组成样本股。
index_e_intro: CSI China Mainland Transportation Index consists of the constituents of CSI 800 Index that are in the transportation sector.
index_c_fullname: 中证内地运输主题指数

index_c_intro: 中证内地资源主题指数由中证800指数中的资源行业公司股票组成样本股。
index_e_intro: CSI China Mainland Natural Resource Index consists of the constituents of CSI 800 Index that are in the resources industries.
index_c_fullname: 中证内地资源主题指数
index_e_fullname: CSI China Mainland Natural Resource Index

index_c_intro: 中证内地基建主题指数由中证800指数中的石油与天然气钻井、建筑与工程、交通基本设施、电信业务等行业公司股票组成样本股。
index_e_intro: CSI China Mainland Infrastructure Index consists of the constituents of CSI 800 Index that are in the oil & gas drilling, transportation infrastructure, telecommunication services or construction & engineering industries.
index_c_fullname: 中证内地基建主题指数

index_c_intro: 中证内地消费主题指数由中证800指数中的主要消费和可选消费行业公司股票组成样本股。
index_e_intro: CSI China Mainland Consumer Index consists of the constituents of CSI 800 Index that are in the consumer staples or consumer discretionary sector.
index_c_fullname: 中证内地消费主题指数

index_c_intro: 中证内地新能源主题指数由中证800指数中具有一定比例新能源生产业务或设备业务的公司股票组成，以反映新能源产业公司的整体表现。
index_e_intro: CSI CN Mainland New Energy Index consists of the constituents of CSI 800 Index which have substantial amount of revenue from new energy or new energy equipments production.
index_c_fullname: 中证内地新能源主题指数
index_e_fullname: CSI CN Mainland New Energy Index

index_c_intro: 中证财富大盘指数按照上市公司创造财富能力的大小进行选样，挑选最具创造财富能力的300家A股上市公司作为样本，且样本个股的权重配置与其创造财富能力的大小相适应。
index_e_intro: CSI Wealth Large Cap Index consists of the stocks of 300 companies which are most capable of creating wealth for shareholders. The Index is weighted by the extent of wealth creating capabilities measured by book value, cash flow and net income.

index_c_intro: 中证民营企业200指数挑选沪深两市最具代表性的200家民营上市公司股票为样本，刻画了沪深两市大型民营上市公司股票的整体表现。
index_e_intro: CSI Private-owned Enterprises 200 Index consists of the most representative large cap private-owned enterprises stocks, which reflects the overall performance of the stocks.
index_c_fullname: 中证民营企业 200 指数

index_c_intro: 中证民营企业综合指数由沪深两市全部民营上市公司组成，旨在全面刻画沪深两市民营上市公司股票的整体表现。
index_e_intro: CSI Private-owned Enterprises Composite Index consists of all the private-owned enterprises stocks, which aims to reflect the overall performance of the category.
index_c_fullname: 中证民营企业综合指数
